name: Deadly Speed
description:
Put you driving skills to the test with this fast-paced racing game! Upgrade your car's visuals and engine and master the traffic! Can you unlock all the cars?

RACE TO WIN!

Never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on and increase your skill. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the world’s best cars. Because one ride is never enough!

Here are some of the main features of this game :

· Many different customizable cars to unlock

· Different locations to race

· 4 exciting game modes

· high quality next generation graphics with support for older phones as well

· Exciting soundtrack

· Car tuning system with neon lights, paint, rims and many engine upgrades
